newsitem.title: GREECE: NATL ECON MIN HIRES NEW CHIEF EXECUTIVES AT STATE AGENCIES.
newsitem.headline: NATL ECON MIN HIRES NEW CHIEF EXECUTIVES AT STATE AGENCIES.

text.p: The national economy ministry announced two new appointments for the post of managing director at state agencies Thessaloniki International Fair SA and the Hellenic Foreign Trade Organisation (OPE).
In a decision signed by national economy minister Yannos Papandoniou, the new managing director of OPE will be Ioannis Tzen.
And Antonis Kourtis will be the new managing director at Thessaloniki International Fair SA. --George Georgiopoulos, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
